Articles.Content:
Beautiful indeed! Just the kind of SSTO I like: sleek-looking as boop (you outdid yourself there), functional, and light.

Rune. Kudos!
Looks great, one of my favourite science fiction spacecraft. I am amazed it looks so good yet is so functional.

That's a very pretty plane right there ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Looks like it might be handleable in FAR as well... may need to test that out ^^
I'll get to it the far bit.
I looooooove the wing design, and that first image is positively smexy! Keep up the good work!
